page.title: 11LUDFORD _CHICKEN & PIG FARMS
page.content: BROOKLYN FARM _ CHICKEN FARM Buildings of 26000 sq.ft. house 15000 chickens bought in at 1 day old. Auto_ _matic feeding controlled by Computor. They produce 150 eggs per bird over a 58 week period after which they are sold. Eggs go to a Depot for hatching. 2 fulltime & 1 part_time employees one of whom housed in tied cottage. GALLEY HILL PIG REARING UNIT _ Buildings of 14000 sq.ft. house 1550 pigs _ they come in at 8_10 weeks old weighing 30 Kilo and cost approximate_ _ly Â£33 each. Fed twice daily by hand _ 2 Kilos of food, medicated initially and later, growth promoter added. At 16 weeks they reach Bacon weight of 100 Kilos. After transport & killing they weigh about 70 Kilos and are worth about 128p a Kilo. Husband & Wife operate this unit.
